/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++0x -Wall -Wextra    CMakeFiles/SurfelViewer.dir/main.o  -o SurfelViewer  -L/home/aslab/Downloads/Pangolin-master/build/src -rdynamic /home/aslab/Downloads/Pangolin-master/build/src/libpangolin.so -lrt -lpthread -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lpthread -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lpython3.5m -ldc1394 -lavcodec -lavformat -lavutil -lswscale -lOpenNI -lOpenNI2 -lpng -lz -ljpeg -ltiff -lIlmImf -Wl,-rpath,/home/aslab/Downloads/Pangolin-master/build/src
